usefulItems: 2 baking trays (30 x 40 cm), baking paper, bowl, oven
title: Lemon olive oil salted macadamia biscuits

ingredients.content: ½ - 1 lemon, zest only, no white pith

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 170°C. Line 2 baking trays (30 x 40 cm) with baking paper and set aside.
Place macadamias into mixing bowl and roughly chop <b>5 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Place sugar and lemon zest into mixing bowl and mill <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add lemon juice, oil, flour, bicarbonate of soda and vanilla and mix <b>10 sec/speed 6<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add reserved chopped nuts and combine <b>5 sec//speed 3<b>.

Place 2 teaspoons of dough (5 cm apart) onto prepared baking trays, gently pressing dough to form circles. Bake for 10-15 minutes (170°C) or until golden. Allow to cool completely on trays (approx. 1 hour) before serving.

hintsAndTricks: You can replace Rapadura sugar with coconut sugar, and you can replace olive oil with macadamia oil if you prefer.
This recipe was originally printed in Jo Whitton's book, Quirky Cooking.
